3: You—you plan to distract all those monsters by yourself?
You two, scram! Or else— Ugh! Just scram!
But I also won't leave you here.
I don't care what those damned Corrupted think they are. I'll show them what the Queen of the streets can do!
It's no use, the professor's already...
The scientist who was once the pioneer of Construct Tech, my mentor.
Disappeared one day due to the overwhelming stress... Who would've thought, in a place like this...
Wait! There's still signs of life here!
If we can use the professor's technology to 'save' this child...
